item.title: How Kroger Became the Biggest Sushi Seller in America
item.description: Millions of shoppers agree: It’s OK to eat supermarket sushi. At U.S. retailers, sales are up over 70% in the past year.

item.title: This Small Ozarks Town---Home to Walmart Headquarters---Is Becoming a New Capital of Cool
item.description: Bentonville, Ark., has turned into a surprising hotspot for delicious food and innovative art

item.title: Macau Reclaims Crown From Vegas as World's Top Gambling Hub
item.description: Fortunes of MGM, Sands and Wynn are rising after they bled cash during years of pandemic border restrictions in the Chinese city.

item.title: Who is the Mogul Bidding for U.S. Steel?
item.description: James Bouchard grew up around steel and deal making; ‘We have the cash,’ he says of is $7.8 billion surprise bid.

item.title: China's Fertility Rate Dropped Sharply, Study Shows
item.description: A Chinese media report gave rare insight into the country’s demographic crisis since Beijing stopped publishing fertility-rate data.

item.title: Georgia GOP's Endless Fight Over 2020 Could Help Biden in 2024
item.description: Donald Trump’s indictment has reignited infighting among Georgia Republicans, stoking fears within the party that the division may tip the state to Joe Biden in 2024.

item.title: Brazil's top military police commanders in the country's capital were arrested on accusations they helped right-wing protesters storm Congress and other government buildings in January.
item.description: Brazil’s top military police commanders in the country’s capital were arrested on accusations they helped right-wing protesters storm Congress and other government buildings in January.

item.title: Hurricane Hilary, a powerful Category 4 storm, barreled north toward Mexico and Southern California.
item.description: Hurricane Hilary, a powerful Category 4 storm, barreled north toward Mexico and Southern California.

item.title: Local authorities are rushing to build football-field-sized fire breaks and are deploying miles of water-carrying pipe around Yellowknife, the capital of Canada's Northwest Territories, to help deal with wildfires that threaten to hit the city this weekend.
item.description: Local authorities are rushing to build football-field-sized fire breaks and are deploying miles of water-carrying pipe around Yellowknife, the capital of Canada’s Northwest Territories, to help deal with wildfires that threaten to hit the city this weekend.

item.title: The former president plans to skip Wednesday's Republican debate and is considering joining Tucker Carlson for an interview.
item.description: The former president plans to skip Wednesday’s Republican debate and is considering joining Tucker Carlson for an interview.

item.title: Federal prosecutors have asked a judge to sentence two leaders of the far-right Proud Boys group to more than three decades in prison, the lengthiest sentences yet sought in connection with the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot.
item.description: Federal prosecutors have asked a judge to sentence two leaders of the far-right Proud Boys group to more than three decades in prison, the lengthiest sentences yet sought in connection with the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot.

item.title: The Biden administration is revoking licenses from hundreds of firearms dealers in a significant escalation of federal enforcement actions.
item.description: The Biden administration is revoking licenses from hundreds of firearms dealers in a significant escalation of federal enforcement actions.

item.title: Donald Trump is likely to push for the Georgia charges against him to be heard in federal court, which could delay the proceeding.
item.description: Donald Trump is likely to push for the Georgia charges against him to be heard in federal court, which could delay the proceeding.

item.title: SoftBank recently bought a 25% stake in Arm that was held by the Japanese technology investor's Vision Fund unit, in a deal that values the chip designer at slightly more than $64 billion.
item.description: SoftBank recently bought a 25% stake in Arm that was held by the Japanese technology investor’s Vision Fund unit, in a deal that values the chip designer at slightly more than $64 billion.

item.title: Amazon has restarted a shipping service for external deliveries that competes with FedEx and UPS.
item.description: Amazon has restarted a shipping service for external deliveries that competes with FedEx and UPS.

item.title: Signs of financial stress at a large asset manager in China are making investors nervous about contagion from the country's slumping property sector.
item.description: Signs of financial stress at a large asset manager in China are making investors nervous about contagion from the country’s slumping property sector.

item.title: Major U.S. stock indexes shed more than 2% this week, deepening their August slump. The Nasdaq fell 0.2% Friday, while the Dow rose less than 0.1% and the S&P 500 lost less than 0.1%.
item.description: Major U.S. stock indexes shed more than 2% this week, deepening their August slump. The Nasdaq fell 0.2% Friday, while the Dow rose less than 0.1% and the S&P 500 lost less than 0.1%.

item.title: The summer bond-market rout is delivering a windfall to savers whose rush into higher-yielding investment products is reshaping the U.S. financial system.
item.description: The summer bond-market rout is delivering a windfall to savers whose rush into higher-yielding investment products is reshaping the U.S. financial system.
